dict.acceptation: 提高（土地、地产）的价值；利用（机会）；改善，改良；

sent.orig: Improve the management tools to improve management efficiency, business efficiency is to improve the main task.
sent.trans: 改善管理手段，提高管理效率，是提高企业效率的主要任务。

sent.orig: The company people-oriented, technology development, improve the technological level and improve the service system.
sent.trans: 本公司以人为本，发展技术，提高技术水平，完善售后服务体系。

sent.orig: Men are anxious to improve their circumstances, are unwilling to improve themselves; they therefore remain bound.
sent.trans: 人们热切地要改善环境，旦却不愿改善自我；这就是为什么他们仍然身受束缚。

sent.orig: Improve fatigue strength of sprayed concrete to improve the pumping performance, reduce the loss of resilience.
sent.trans: 调动井喷水泥疲劳烈度，改善泵送机能，递减回弹损失。

sent.orig: If you improve your diet, your hair will also improve.
sent.trans: 改善一下你的膳食，头发也会随之得到改善。
